metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7506 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
spice versions though 0.13 are vulnerable to out-of-bounds memory access when processing specially crafted messages from authenticated attacker to the spice server resulting into crash and/or server memory leak.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7506` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libspice-server1 - 0.12.6-4ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: spice package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.12.6-4ubuntu0.3').
